categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Mustafar system was a solar system in the Atravis sector that contained the volcanic planet of Mustafar, two gas giants, called Jestefad and Lefrani and the oceanic moon Nur. During the Clone Wars, the system was affiliated with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Fifteen years later, it belonged to the Galactic Empire. During the Imperial Era, both the Sith Lord Darth Vader, and his team of Inquisitors kept their fortresses in the system, on Mustafar and Nur respectively.
